contentrichtext.text: '''[[Greenland]]''' is a dependency of Denmark and an island adjacent to the North American continent. {{TOCright}} '''Greenland''' may also refer to: ==People== * [[Greenland (surname)]] ==Places== In '''Barbados''': * [[Greenland, Saint Andrew, Barbados]] In '''Canada''': *[[Greenland, Nova Scotia]] In the '''United Kingdom''': *[[Greenland, County Antrim]], a townland in County Antrim, Northern Ireland * [[Greenland Dock]], in London * [[Greenlands]], country house in Oxfordshire In the '''United States''': * [[Greenland, Arkansas]], in Washington County * [[Greenland, California]], in Butte County * [[Greenland, Colorado]], in Douglas County * [[Greenland, New Hampshire]], in Rockingham County * [[Greenland, West Virginia]], in Grant County * [[Greenland Hills, Dallas, Texas]], in Dallas County ==Fauna== * [[Greenland cod]], ''Gadus ogac'' * [[Greenland Dog]], husky breed * [[Greenland halibut]], ''Reinhardtius hippoglossoides'' * [[Greenland shark]], ''Somniosus microcephalus'' ==Theatre and music== * [[Greenland (album)|''Greenland'' (album)]], 2006 album by Cracker * [[Greenland (1988 play)|''Greenland'' (1988 play)]], by English playwright Howard Brenton * [[Greenland (2009 play)|''Greenland'' (2009 play)]], by Canadian playwright [[Nicolas Billon]] * [[Greenland (2011 play)|''Greenland'' (2011 play)]], by English playwrights Moira Buffini, Penelope Skinner, Matt Charman and Jack Thorne ==Other== * GREENLAND, the callsign of the airline, [[Air Greenland]] * {{SS|Greenland}}, a number of ships with this name ==See also== * "[[Greeneland]]", a literary setting typical of the novels of Graham Greene: a poor, hot, and dusty tropical backwater. * [[Greenland Township (disambiguation)]] *[[Gronland (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
